Reviews.Title: best nikon with price spend
Reviews.Author: Alaa
Reviews.Content: This camera has the best value , I love it and love the shots on it , really worth the money.Both camera and lens are made in thailand.

Reviews.Title: My first Nikon DSLR
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Tapia Luna
Reviews.Content: The camera, lens and accessories were well packed, and delivery at time. Camera seems not bulky and has many features that now Im learning how to use, lens is compact and powerful my first pictures seems well and hope improve it.
